title: Sand Elemental
summaries: The Sand Elemental is a rare Hardmode enemy which spawns in the Desert during a Sandstorm. She is guaranteed to drop a Forbidden Fragment, the main ingredient for the Forbidden armor as well as the Spirit Flame.

Sand Elementals attack by summoning three Ancient Storms randomly around the general location of the player. The distance between them varies, and they remain stationary for their lifespan. Sand Elementals cannot travel through <linked>blocks</linked>, and fly in a non-linear pattern. They attempt to move towards the player and get faster as their health depletes.
She is one of the few entities that can be detected by the Lifeform Analyzer or its upgrades.
